description:
My place is close to 44 & X Hell's Kitchen 
Times Square 
Meatpacking District

. You’ll love my place because of the views, the location, the high ceilings, the people, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The apartment accessories and new so you have everything you need. Furthermore there is a balcony with a beautiful view. Also the location is quit and comfortable. You have near by the most central metro station (42 station). I will be glad to answer any question and to make your stay enjoyable and unforgettable.
name: Best View in manhattan, 1BR near Times Square.
